author: jstrachan
msg: Patches to the JellyUnit scripts to make them a little quieter when folks run them.

author: jstrachan
msg: regenerated the latest build.xml to include the xmlunit dependency

author: jstrachan
msg: Applied Jason Horman's patch to support XPath sorting when navigating over XML data via <x:forEach/>. Thanks for your patch Jason!

author: jstrachan
msg: Applied Knut Wannheden's patch that allows XML documents to be compared for equality within a JellyUnit test case.
Now JellyUnit has most bases covered for XML testing
* schema validation via the jelly:validate library, testing XML against DTDs, XML Schema, RelaxNG etc
* performing XSLT on some XML and then then performing any of the above

author: jstrachan
msg: Fixed bug that both Gordon and James Johnson found recently.
The problem was that by default the child scope didn't inherit the parent attributes.
Now fixed and added a JellyUnit test case for this.
